attributes.action: make recycling mandatory in uk schools
attributes.background: local authorities spend one billion pounds on cleaning litter and fifty four percent of British people believe recycling is an issue in their area.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you want schools in England to be required to teach the importance of recycling, you could start a petition calling for that.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
